p.style: margin: 0px ; font-stretch: normal ; line-height: normal ; font-family: "helvetica neue"
margin: 0px ; font-stretch: normal ; line-height: normal ; font-family: "helvetica neue"

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 319px; margin-left: 296px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 2px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
1. Two warning signs should be installed at both ends of the power transmission corridor and
road intersection (a total of 4 warning signs are required at each intersection) to remind passing
pedestrians and vehicles to pay attention to safety. How many road warning signs need to be
installed after the construction of these three transmission lines?
2. What is the total area of ​​the three power transmission corridors? Due to the planning of the three power
transmission corridors, how much additional facility land (facilities) needs to be added to the existing land planning?
It is believed that the location of the transmission corridor needs to be planned as facility land.
3. What tree species are there in the transmission corridor? How many trees are there? What is the average age?

switch.text: 1. Two warning signs should be installed at both ends of the power transmission corridor and...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 154px; margin-left: 296px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 2px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
1. What are the numbers and populations of the residential areas that the transmission
corridor will pass through? What is the proportion of the area affected by the transmission
corridor in each residential area to the total area of ​​the residential area?
Estimate the affected population in each residential area?

switch.text: 1. What are the numbers and populations of the residential areas that the transmission...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 514px; margin-left: 589px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 2px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.span: 1. What are the material costs for the three transmission lines?
The evidence we can provide includes
The length (km), material, number of parallel lines, number of iron towers included, and material of
each line are very important for this decision.

span.span: 2. How many trees will be cut down for the construction of transmission lines?
What is the average age of these trees?
Assume that trees within 50m of a straight line from the transmission line are to be cut down.

div.span: When each tower leaves the factory, the manufacturer has given the loss ratio of sectional area in ten years.
How many towers will need to be replaced after 10 years?
Suppose the tower with a corrosion rate greater than 0.9 needs to be replaced?

switch.text: 1. What are the material costs for the three transmission lines? The evidence we can provide includes...
